title: With His Consent
description: Just days after meeting the enigmatic, domineering Robert Foster in the elevator Pam finds herself experiencing a sexual awakening she'd never imagined. Her body and mind have been pushed to the edge by Foster, and she's broken taboos she didn't even suspect existed. Now, resting in his office in a post-coital stupor, Pam is about to learn why Robert finds her so intriguing. In a story that takes Pam from the streets of New York to the boulevards of Paris, With His Consent is the third story in the steamy, taboo breaking, globally best selling Dominated by the Billionaire: Fifty Shades of Lust series. The first two stories, At His Command and On His Orders, and the fourth installment, For His Affection, are available now at Amazon and all good bookstores.
author: Aya Fukunishi
